channel.title: Convert text into audio in Spanish – Politepix

item.title: Convert text into audio in Spanish
item.dc:creator: pantinflas
item.description:
I’ve been doing some research about spanish offline tts and I found that Open Ears is the best choice. However, I don’t know how to change language in Open Ears. I don’t want to recognize voice, I only need to convert text into voice, and I need to do it in Spanish and English.
If anyone knows how to do this please tell me.

item.title: Reply To: Convert text into audio in Spanish
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description: NeatSpeech can now perform Spanish offline TTS: /neatspeech
